name: Go little Bat
description:
This game is about a little bat, here it is by the way    

She is very lonely and hungry, help her find food 

As you know bats can not use their eyes, but they have sonar, use it (key SPACE)

To fly use WASD or the arrows.

Good luck surviving another day!

The dynamic music (which was written by yourself) will tell you that you are close to death!

This game was developed in 2 days without an engine in a language I have seen for the first time
